bibl.title: P. Grenf. II 73. A Reconsideration.
bibl.note: Great Oasis, late III. "The circumstances of this letter remain elusive. The reference to grave-diggers, geographical considerations and the sense of a number of phrases seem to accord with the view that the letter refers to the transfer of a mummified corpse."
bibl.seg: LLEWELYN Stephen R. and Alanna M. NOBBS, P. Grenf. II 73. A Reconsideration.
Akten des 21. Internationalen Papyrologenkongresses = ArchPF. Beiheft 3. II (Stuttgart - Leipzig, 1997) pp. 613-630.

Great Oasis, late III. "The circumstances of this letter remain elusive. The reference to grave-diggers, geographical considerations and the sense of a number of phrases seem to accord with the view that the letter refers to the transfer of a mummified corpse."
